text: 9 sanningar och en lögn is a studio album by Martin Stenmarck and was released on 25 October 2006. ==Track listing== #Sjumilakliv - 4:46 #Dårarna och jag - 3:40 #Ta undulaten - 4:22 #Han är galen - 3:27 #Ta dom jävlarna - 4:00 #Hand i hand - 3:42 (duet with Søs Fenger) #Nästa dans - 3:40 #Om du rör mig dör jag - 2:57 #Virvelvinden du - 5:27 #Hem - 5:16 ==Contributors== *Martin Stenmarck - vocals *Sebastian Nylund - guitar *Stefan Olsson - bass *Peer Åström - drums *Rickard Nilsson - piano ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable" !Chart (2006-2007) !Peak position |- |Swedish Albums (Sverigetopplistan) |align="center"|1 |} ===Year- end charts=== {| class="wikitable" !Chart (2006) !Position |- |Swedish Albums (Sverigetopplistan) |align="center"|6 |- !Chart (2007) !Position |- |Swedish Albums (Sverigetopplistan) |align="center"|69 |} ==References== Category:2006 albums Category:Martin Stenmarck albums Category:Universal Music Group albums Category:Swedish-language albums
title: 9 sanningar och en lögn
